task.title: Creating replications
task.shortdesc: After references to the source and destination clusters are created, replication can be created between the clusters.

context.p: After replication has been configured and started, view current status and list of replications in the Ongoing Replications section.

step.cmd: Click Create Replication to configure a new XDCR replication. A panel appears where you can configure a new replication from source to destination cluster.
In the Replicate changes from section select a from the current cluster that is to be replicated. This is your source bucket.
In the To section, select a destination cluster and enter a bucket name from the destination cluster:
Click the Replicate button to start the replication process.
